<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/export/{type}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Export data in the specified format

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"type","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Export type (csv, json, etc.)","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"filter":{"type":"object","description":"Filter to apply to the data"},"fields":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"description":"Fields to include in the export"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Export initiated successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"code":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"message":{"type":"string"}},"title":"Success"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
